headline: New Relic Announces Brian Emerson as Chief Product Officer
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, October 20, 2025--New Relic, the Intelligent Observability company, announced the appointment of Brian Emerson as Chief Product Officer (CPO). Emerson will lead the innovation strategy and execution for the company’s Intelligent Observability Platform, which 85,000 customers around the world use to optimize business and IT operations, and control costs.
